Format the code according to the project's coding standards and conventions.
This prompt is used to reformat and fix the formatting of the specified file(s).
Ensure that the code is clean, readable, and follows best practices.
Use consistent indentation, naming conventions, and comment where necessary to enhance understanding.
If applicable, run any automated formatting tools or linters to ensure compliance with the project's style guidelines.
Conform to any additional instructions provided according to the context.
